title: Ready and able
brief_description: Members of the CFA provide practical advice on how to prepare for and survive a major catastrophe like a bushfire or a flood. These interviews were conducted in light of the tragic Black Saturday bushfires in February 2009.
description: Members of the CFA provide practical advice on how to prepare for and survive a major catastrophe like a bushfire or a flood. These interviews were conducted in light of the tragic Black Saturday bushfires in February 2009.
